com.prc.alp.liaison.plugin
Interface LiaisonStateModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
LiaisonStateModelAdapter
public interface LiaisonStateModel

Defines state transitions for liaison with external agent socieities; not currently in active use.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1

Field Summary
static int INITIATE
          Able to initiate interactions with external agents
static int OPEN
          Initialized and attached to an external society
static int RESPOND
          Able to respond to interactions initiated by other agents
static int UNINITIALIZED
          Must be initialized before any interactions are possible
 
Method Summary
 boolean canInitiate()
          Whether or not the current state includes INITIATE ability.
 boolean canRespond()
          Whether or not the current state includes RESPOND ability.
 void close()
          Object should transition to the UNINITIALIZED state.
 void disableInitiate()
          Called object should remove INITIATE from its state.
 void disableRespond()
          Called object should remove INITIATE state from its state.
 void enableInitiate()
          Object should add INITIATE to its current state.
 void enableRespond()
          Object should add RESPOND to its current state.
 int getState()
          Return the current state of the object
 void open()
          Initialize.

Method Detail

open

public void open()
          throws org.cougaar.util.StateModelException
Initialize. Transition object from UNINITIALIZED to OPEN state.
Throws:
alp.util.StateModelException - Cannot transition to new state.

close

public void close()
           throws org.cougaar.util.StateModelException
Object should transition to the UNINITIALIZED state.
Throws:
alp.util.StateModelException - Cannot transition to new state.

enableInitiate

public void enableInitiate()
                    throws org.cougaar.util.StateModelException
Object should add INITIATE to its current state.
Throws:
alp.util.StateModelException - Cannot transition to new state.

disableInitiate

public void disableInitiate()
                     throws org.cougaar.util.StateModelException
Called object should remove INITIATE from its state.
Throws:
alp.util.StateModelException - Cannot transition to new state.

enableRespond

public void enableRespond()
                   throws org.cougaar.util.StateModelException
Object should add RESPOND to its current state.
Throws:
alp.util.StateModelException - Cannot transition to new state.

disableRespond

public void disableRespond()
                    throws org.cougaar.util.StateModelException
Called object should remove INITIATE state from its state.
Throws:
alp.util.StateModelException - Cannot transition to new state.

canInitiate

public boolean canInitiate()
Whether or not the current state includes INITIATE ability.
Returns:
true if the current state allows the local agent to initiate interactions with external agents; false otherwise

canRespond

public boolean canRespond()
Whether or not the current state includes RESPOND ability.
Returns:
true if the current state allows the local agent to respond to interactions initiated by external agents; false otherwise

getState

public int getState()
Return the current state of the object
Returns:
object state
